segments.text: I can't help but notice the two children on the other side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching deep into a cookie jar in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, he's definitely trying to snag some cookies without permission!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is right there, with her hand out, waiting expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're such little rascals, pulling off this secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the woman hasn't heard them, with all the climbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, almost about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a risky maneuver for a sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Part of me wants to scold them for being so naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But another part finds their coordinated effort quite amusing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they don't get hurt in their quest for sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR
